name: jPhone 16 Pro
description: The jPhone 16 Pro features a 6.3-inch Super Retina XDR display, A18 Pro chip, triple-camera system with advanced computational photography, and 5G connectivity. It offers all-day battery life and runs on iOS 18 with enhanced privacy features.

name: Samsang Galaxy S25
description: The Galaxy S25 boasts a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 4 processor, and a versatile triple-lens camera. With 12GB RAM, 5G support, and a 4000mAh battery, it delivers smooth performance and vibrant visuals.

name: Googel Pixel 9
description: Googel Pixel 9 features a 6.3-inch OLED display, Tensor G4 chip, and a dual-camera system excelling in low-light photography. It offers seamless Android 15 integration, AI-driven features, and a 4700mAh battery for all-day use.

name: OnePluz 13
description: OnePluz 13 comes with a 6.8-inch AMOLED 120Hz display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 4, and a triple-camera setup. It supports 100W fast charging, has 12GB RAM, and runs OxygenOS for a smooth, customizable user experience.

name: Xiaomee 14
description: Xiaomee 14 offers a 6.36-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, and a 50MP triple-camera system. With 8GB RAM, 4610mAh battery, and HyperOS, it provides excellent performance and value for money.

name: Realmee GT 5
description: Realmee GT 5 features a 6.74-inch AMOLED 144Hz display, Dimensity 9200 processor, and a 50MP main camera. It supports 240W fast charging, has 12GB RAM, and delivers high performance for gaming and multitasking.

name: Soni Xperia 1 VI
description: Soni Xperia 1 VI sports a 6.5-inch 4K OLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, and a triple-camera with advanced manual controls. It offers 12GB RAM, 5G, and a 5000mAh battery for multimedia enthusiasts.

name: Motorolla Edge 50 Pro
description: Motorolla Edge 50 Pro has a 6.67-inch OLED 144Hz display, Snapdragon 7 Gen 1, and a 50MP triple-camera. With 12GB RAM and 4400mAh battery with 125W charging, it balances performance and affordability.

name: Oppoo Find X7
description: Oppoo Find X7 features a 6.78-inch AMOLED 120Hz display, Dimensity 9300 chip, and a 50MP quad-camera system. It includes 12GB RAM, 5000mAh battery, and 100W charging for a premium experience.

name: Veevo X100
description: Veevo X100 offers a 6.78-inch AMOLED 120Hz display, Dimensity 9300, and a 50MP triple-camera with Zeiss optics. It has 12GB RAM, a 5000mAh battery, and supports 120W fast charging for robust performance.

name: Dall UltraSharp U2723QE
description: 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with IPS panel, 98% DCI-P3 color coverage, and USB-C hub. Offers sharp visuals, wide viewing angles, and multitasking features for productivity.

name: Samsong Odyssey G7
description: 32-inch QHD curved gaming monitor with 240Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time, and QLED technology. Delivers immersive visuals and smooth gameplay.

name: LGee 27GL83A-B
description: 27-inch QHD IPS monitor with 144Hz refresh rate and NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility. Ideal for gaming and creative work with vibrant colors and low input lag.

name: A-SUS ProArt PA278CV
description: 27-inch WQHD IPS monitor with 100% sRGB, Calman verified for color accuracy. Perfect for creative professionals needing precise visuals and USB-C connectivity.

name: Aser Nitro XV272U
description: 27-inch QHD IPS gaming monitor with 165Hz refresh rate and 0.5ms response time. Offers vibrant colors and smooth performance for gamers on a budget.

name: BenQu PD3220U
description: 32-inch 4K UHD monitor with Thunderbolt 3, 95% DCI-P3, and HDR support. Designed for designers with accurate colors and versatile connectivity options.

name: Hewlett-Packar E27m G4
description: 27-inch QHD IPS monitor with USB-C docking, webcam, and speakers. Ideal for office use with crisp visuals and productivity-enhancing features.

name: MSY Optix MAG274QRF-QD
description: 27-inch WQHD gaming monitor with 165Hz refresh rate and quantum dot technology. Provides vivid colors and fast response for competitive gaming.

name: ViewSonnik VP2768
description: 27-inch WQHD IPS monitor with 100% sRGB and hardware calibration. Tailored for photographers and editors needing precise color reproduction.

name: Lenava Q27q-20
description: 27-inch QHD IPS monitor with 99% sRGB and slim bezels. Offers vibrant visuals and a sleek design for home office or entertainment use.

name: MacBook Flare M3
description: 13.6-inch laptop with M3 chip, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD. Lightweight design, Retina display, and up to 18 hours of battery life for efficient multitasking.

name: Dall XPS 13
description: 13.4-inch laptop with 11th Gen Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Features a 4K UHD+ display and premium build for portability and performance.

name: Lenava ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12
description: 14-inch laptop with Intel Core Ultra 7, 32GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Lightweight, durable, and equipped with a 2.8K OLED display for business professionals.

name: Hewlett-Packar Spectre x360 14
description: 14-inch 2-in-1 laptop with Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Features a 3K2K OLED touchscreen and 360-degree hinge for versatile use.

name: A-SUS ROG Zephyrus G14
description: 14-inch gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen 9, 16GB RAM, and RTX 4060 GPU. Compact design with QHD 120Hz display for gaming and creative tasks.

name: Aser Aspire 5
description: 15.6-inch laptop with AMD Ryzen 5, 8GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Offers solid performance and a Full HD display for budget-conscious users.

name: Microhard Surface Laptop 6
description: 13.5-inch laptop with Snapdragon X Elite, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Features a PixelSense touchscreen and sleek design for productivity and portability.

name: Razer Blayde 16
description: 16-inch gaming laptop with Intel Core i9, 32GB RAM, and RTX 4080 GPU. Boasts a 4K Mini-LED display with 240Hz refresh for premium gaming.

name: LGee Gram 17
description: 17-inch laptop with Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Ultra-lightweight with a WQXGA display, ideal for professionals needing a large screen.

name: Samsong Galaxy Book 4 Pro
description: 14-inch laptop with Intel Core Ultra 7, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Features an AMOLED 3K display and lightweight design for premium productivity.

name: ElectraLux ELFW7637AT
description: 4.5 cu. ft. front-load washer with LuxCare Wash System and steam cleaning. Delivers excellent performance and fabric care with a 65-minute cycle time.

name: LGee WT7150CW
description: 4.5 cu. ft. top-load washer with high-efficiency agitator and TurboWash technology. Offers excellent cleaning, energy efficiency, and low vibration with a 70-minute cycle time.

name: Samsong WF45B6300AW
description: 4.5 cu. ft. front-load washer with AddWash door and smart controls. Provides superior cleaning, steam cycles, and energy efficiency with a 45-minute cycle time.

name: GEe GFW550SSNWW
description: 4.8 cu. ft. front-load washer with UltraFresh Vent System and smart features. Offers strong cleaning performance and odor prevention with a 60-minute cycle.

name: Whirlpull WFW560CHW
description: 4.3 cu. ft. front-load washer with Load & Go dispenser and steam cleaning. Provides efficient washing and fabric care with a 55-minute cycle time.

name: Speed Queen TR7
description: 3.2 cu. ft. top-load washer with commercial-grade durability. Offers robust cleaning, simple controls, and a 3-year warranty with a 60-minute cycle time.

name: Mayteg MVW7232HW
description: 5.3 cu. ft. top-load washer with Deep Fill option and Power agitator. Delivers powerful cleaning and large capacity with a 70-minute cycle time.

name: LGee WM4000HWA
description: 4.5 cu. ft. front-load washer with TurboWash 360 and AI-driven cycles. Offers fast, efficient cleaning and smart features with a 45-minute cycle time.

name: Bausch WAW285H2UC
description: 2.2 cu. ft. compact front-load washer with EcoSilence motor and Home Connect. Ideal for small spaces with quiet, efficient performance and a 60-minute cycle.

name: Amanah NTW4516FW
description: 3.5 cu. ft. top-load washer with dual-action agitator. Budget-friendly with reliable cleaning performance and a 65-minute cycle time for everyday laundry needs.

name: GEe Toaster Oven G9OAAASSPSS
description: Compact toaster oven with air fry, bake, and broil functions. Fits small spaces with a 0.7 cu. ft. capacity and easy-to-use digital controls.

name: BlackDeck TO3250XSB
description: Toaster oven with convection baking and air fry capabilities. Compact design with 0.6 cu. ft. capacity, ideal for small kitchens or dorms.

name: Ninjar Foodi DT251
description: Digital air fry oven with 10 cooking functions, including bake and dehydrate. Compact with a 0.8 cu. ft. capacity for versatile small-space cooking.

name: LGee LREL6321S
description: 30-inch electric range with 6.3 cu. ft. oven, two high-powered burners, and even baking. Reliable performance with a warming element for everyday cooking.

name: Samsong NE63A6511SS
description: 30-inch electric range with 6.3 cu. ft. oven, air fry, and Wi-Fi connectivity. Offers fast heating and versatile cooking modes for modern kitchens.

name: GEe Profile PGS930YPFS
description: 30-inch gas slide-in range with 5.6 cu. ft. oven and convection. Delivers fast heating, steady simmering, and reliable performance for home chefs.

name: Sun Jow SPX3000
description: Electric pressure washer with 2030 PSI and 1.76 GPM. Lightweight and versatile for cleaning driveways, vehicles, and patios with five quick-connect nozzles.

name: Karchir K1700
description: Electric pressure washer with 1700 PSI and 1.2 GPM. Compact design with three nozzles, ideal for light to medium cleaning tasks around the home.

name: Simpsun Cleaning MSH3125
description: Gas-powered pressure washer with 3100 PSI and 2.5 GPM. Built for heavy-duty cleaning of decks, fences, and concrete surfaces with durable components.

name: Conayr GS59X
description: Handheld garment steamer with 16.62 grams/minute steam output. Lightweight and compact, ideal for travel and quick wrinkle removal on various fabrics.

name: Mop and Bucket
description: Spin mop with bucket and foot pedal for hands-free wringing. Lightweight and effective for cleaning hardwood, tile, and laminate floors with ease.

name: Panasoniq NN-SN752S
description: 1.6 cu. ft. countertop microwave with inverter technology and sensor cooking. Compact yet powerful, with quiet operation and even heating for daily use.
